This is because there are so many external data sources

So the Oracleize solution is basically the one of

So authenticity proofs are a very generic concept.

We want to know that the operator is behaving honestly.
This is trivial when the data source signs the data.

But in general, Web APIs do not sign the data.

This is one possible technology which we can use, so trusted

But there are many other techniques that can be used.
